nodes.text: So what's up with you?
I'm working on my latest song about the Noctes de Mortuis...

Tonight, tonight, won't be just any night -
Tonight the dead will rise from their rest.

Tonight, tonight, try not to die from fright -
For the ghosts have become repossessed.

Tonight, the halls will fill with undead,
You'll quiver in your bunk bed,
It isn't just a dream.

But do not scream,
It's not quite what it seems, just sit tight -
Tonight!
What do you think?
It's the best Noctes de Mortuis song I've ever heard.
<grin>
It sounds pretty good.
<sigh> If it's only pretty good, then I'll need to re-write it.
As songs go, that's one of them who should have gone.
<sigh>
So what is Noctes de Mortuis, exactly?

It's the time of year when the barrier between the world of the dead and the land of the living is breached. The restless spirits of those people who had unfinished business in life return to this world to seek absolution or vengeance.
So it's a kind of 'get out of dead' free time where the Undead stalk our block kind of thing?
Oh, they aren't really Undead. They're just ghosts. They may look scary, but they can't really harm you. Unless, of course, you harmed them when they were living.
Bad time to be a murderer, I guess.

If in life he done you wrong, Now in death you can be strong. Vengeance is the way to go
To the one who laid you low.
On the other hand, not all ghosts are back for revenge. Some come for the fun. Others, well... If in life you were a jerk, now you can come back to lurk. Much like our dear Mr. Terk.
Did you hear that Joel Kyro died?
Yeah, it's a shame. He was kind of creepy, but he seemed nice enough.
Did you hear how Joel Kyro was lost in the catacombs below the castle?
The Catacombs is just about the last place I'd want to visit, let alone being stuck down there.
I'm the one who rescued him.
I'm glad that he's safe. Nice work - you are living up to the Hero-U core values. Next thing you know, we'll all be calling you a Hero!

options.text: Ask Aeolus to Clean the Room

nodes.text: You did a fine job of cleaning up some of the mess in this room... why not clean up the rest of it while you are at it?
I'll try to get around to it soon.
You sound just like my stepmother.
It really would be nice if you'd clean up your mess in here. I'd really appreciate it.
(Sigh)
I'll try to get around to it soon.

If the castle ever caught fire while I was in this room, This junk would become a pyre, and I would soon be toast. That will be your doom - for I will be a ghost. I'll haunt you to your cold grey tomb, if you don't clean this room up soon.

The tale that you relate,
Fills me with distress.
I'd hate to face that fate.
So I'd best clean up this mess.
Rest in Peace.
Just as long as I'm not resting in pieces.
